channel.title: How do I upgrade to Whonix 16.0.3.1 Point Release from an existing 16.x.x.x install ?
channel.description:
I am currently on Whonix(KVM) version 16.0.2.7. Is there a way I can update to Whonix 16.0.3.1 without having to do it manually ?
sudo apt-get update does not seem to reveal available updates to a more recent release.
I dd however get updates to applications as it should.

item.title: How do I upgrade to Whonix 16.0.3.1 Point Release from an existing 16.x.x.x install ?
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Just run apt like you would any Debian system

Read full topic
item.source: How do I upgrade to Whonix 16.0.3.1 Point Release from an existing 16.x.x.x install ?
